overview.headline: Primary-level surge protection for service entrances up to 400 Amps
positioning_headlines: For IEEE Category B & Category C Panels / Primary Locations
Basic Primary Level Protection For Panels Up To 400 Amps
marketing_paragraphs: It isolates your sensitive downline equipment from nearby switching motor loads and in-house surges as it provides a seamless grid of pure AC power. SurgePure preserves your assets and maximizes your long-term profits.
The SurgePure Mach 2 SPD System features non-degrading Single Element (SE*) surge protection. It is primary level surge protection to be located at your service entrance for up to 250 kW.
overview.technical_summary: Mach 2 supports high-voltage 3Ø systems including Hi-Leg configurations while maintaining single-element surge path integrity.

key_features: LEDs constantly monitor performance and protection status of each phase
Unique fuse-links maintain safety of high-energy, non-degrading surge capacity
Designed for easy mounting and installation for fast response-time protection
Up to 355,000 solid amps of safe, non-degrading, single-element surge protection
Integral grid of primary and secondary non-degrading SPD technology providing 24/7 AC power system integrity

safety_ratings_and_claims.type_rating_claim: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2
safety_ratings_and_claims.element_definition_claim: SE* indicates single element per surge path

status_and_options.status_indicators: Lifetime green LED self-test protection status monitors for each phase
